name: Abribus
description:
Initially ranked 6 at the #GDCJam over 127 games.

As a ghost, help people resolve the problems that held them in the limbs.

  • A zen atmosphere with cute graphics
  • Help people reorganizing their thoughts by entering inside their mind
  • Features 16 levels, more than 30 different characters and a Time Attack mode

Credits:

  • Aurélien Montero (Twitter): Sound design & Music
  • Antoine Semblat (Twitter / Patreon): Game Design, Art & Programming
